articles.contents:
Stephan Teodosescu

                         Resume
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            An analytics professional (read: Data Nerd) with a background rooted at the intersection of engineering, science, and business. I partner with stakeholders to make processes more efficient and solve their complex business problems using rigorous analysis and data. Prior to joining Apple, I worked in specialty tax consulting at BDO USA, LLP. Before that, I graduated from Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo with a blended BS/MS degree in Biomedical Engineering. My professional interests include business analytics, statistics, finance, tech, and leadership development. I also dabble in sports analytics on the side.
            
            
            Education
            California Polytechnic State University, SLO | San Luis Obispo, CA
            M.S. in Biomedical Engineering | September 2013 - June 2015
            California Polytechnic State University, SLO | San Luis Obispo, CA
            B.S. in Biomedical Engineering | September 2009 - June 2013
            
            
            Experience
            Apple | Data Analyst | May 2019 - Present
            BDO USA, LLP | R&D Tax Consultant | June 2015 - May 2019
            Cytori Therapeutics | R&D Engineering Intern | June 2014 - March 2015

articles.title: Projects
articles.description: A repository of my analytics projects
articles.contents:
2022 Men's FIFA World Cup Predictions


Simulations and predictions for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar.






Tableau: World Football Matchday Portal


A suite of dashboards highlighting standings and match outcomes of the biggest football leagues in the world. Built in Tableau Public.






Club Soccer Forecasts


My Club Soccer Forecasts app simulates and visualizes the results of the current Premier League season. Built using the Shiny app framework.






IMDB Ratings Tool


TV series and ratings data for 1000+ shows in the IMDb database.






F1 Analytics


Website dedicated to Formula 1 analytics and visualizaton.






NFL Analytics


Website dedicated to NFL advanced stats and analysis.






NHL Odds App


My NHL odds app shows the latest stats, standings, and playoff probabilities for all 32 NHL teams.






Tableau: U.S. Air Travel Dashboard


This dashboard explores how COVID-19 disrupted commericial airline travel in the United States. Created using Tableau Public.
